spx.net

Class RemoteServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • spx.net.RemoteServer

  • public class RemoteServer
extends java.lang.Object
    RemoteServer class for connecting to and controlling remote SPx servers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RemoteServer.AlertHandler
      The AlertHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerAlerts method, to be called when an alert message is received.
      static interface  RemoteServer.AVInfoHandler
      The AVInfoHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerAVInfo method, to be called when an AV info report is received.
      static interface  RemoteServer.DisconnectHandler
      The DisconnectHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerDisconnect() method, to be called when the remote server disconnects from a connected client.
      static interface  RemoteServer.HeartbeatHandler
      The HeartbeatHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerHeartbeats method, to be called when a heartbeat is received.
      static interface  RemoteServer.MessageHandler
      The MessageHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerMessages method, to be called when a message is received.
      static interface  RemoteServer.PlotHandler
      The PlotHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerPlots method, to be called when a plot report is received.
      static interface  RemoteServer.TrackerStatusHandler
      The TrackerStatusHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerTrackerStatus method, to be called when a tracker status message is received.
      static interface  RemoteServer.TrackHandler
      The TrackHandler interface allows a callback function to be installed into a RemoteServer class, using the installHandlerTracks method, to be called when a track report is received.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteServer()
      Creates a new RemoteServer, listening for heartbeats on the default heartbeat address and port.
      RemoteServer(java.lang.String hbeatAddr)
      Creates a new RemoteServer, listening for heartbeats on the specified heartbeat address and default heartbeat port.
      RemoteServer(java.lang.String hbeatAddr, int hbeatPort)
      Creates a new RemoteServer, listening for heartbeats on the specified heartbeat address and port.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteServer

        public RemoteServer()
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Creates a new RemoteServer, listening for heartbeats on the default heartbeat address and port.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If the IP address could not be determined.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O operation failed.
        See Also:
        DefaultAddresses, DefaultPorts

      • RemoteServer

        public RemoteServer(java.lang.String hbeatAddr)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Creates a new RemoteServer, listening for heartbeats on the specified heartbeat address and default heartbeat port.
        Parameters:
        hbeatAddr - Heartbeat address as hostname or IP address in dotted notation.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If the IP address could not be determined.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O operation failed.
        See Also:
        DefaultPorts

      • RemoteServer

        public RemoteServer(java.lang.String hbeatAddr,
                    int hbeatPort)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Creates a new RemoteServer, listening for heartbeats on the specified heartbeat address and port.
        Parameters:
        hbeatAddr - Heartbeat address as hostname or IP address in dotted notation.
        hbeatPort - Heartbeat port.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If the IP address could not be determined.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O operation failed.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.net.InetAddress address,
                    int port)
             throws java.net.ConnectException,
                    java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                    java.io.InterruptedIOException,
                    java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Connect to the server at the specified address and port.
        Parameters:
        address - InetAddress form of IP address.
        port - Server's listening port.
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException - If connection to the remote server fails.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - If the socket times out while trying to connect.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - If the connect operation is interrupted.
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If the specified host cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - If some other IO error occurs.

      • connect

                    int port)
             throws java.net.ConnectException,
                    java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                    java.io.InterruptedIOException,
                    java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        connect to the server at the specified address and port.
        Parameters:
        address - Integer form of IP address.
        port - Server's listening port.
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException - If connection to the remote server fails.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - If the socket times out while trying to connect.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - If the connect operation is interrupted.
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If the specified host cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - If some other IO error occurs.

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String address,
                    int port)
             throws java.net.ConnectException,
                    java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                    java.io.InterruptedIOException,
                    java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Connect to the server at the specified address and port.
        Parameters:
        address - String form of IP address as hostname or dotted notation.
        port - Server's listening port.
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException - If connection to the remote server fails.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - If the socket times out while trying to connect.
        java.io.InterruptedIOException - If the connect operation is interrupted.
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If the specified host cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - If some other IO error occurs.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Disconnect from the connected server.

        If no server is currently connected this function will do nothing.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

        public boolean isConnected()

        Returns:
        true if connected, false otherwise.

                               int port)
        Query if the remote server object is currently connected to a remote server at the specified address and port.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to check.
        port - Port to check.
        Returns:
        true if connected to server at specified address and port, false otherwise.

      • installHandlerMessages

        public void installHandlerMessages(RemoteServer.MessageHandler msgHandler,
                                   java.lang.String prefix)
        Install a function to be called when a message is received from the connected server.
        Parameters:
        msgHandler - Callback function.
        prefix - Prefix with which message must begin to call this callback. The first message handler found that matches the prefix is called first, so install more specific prefixes before more general prefixes. If prefix is null, then the callback is called if no other callbacks match the prefix.

      • installHandlerHeartbeats

        public void installHandlerHeartbeats(RemoteServer.HeartbeatHandler hbHandler)
        Install a function to be called when a heartbeat is received.
        Parameters:
        hbHandler - Callback function.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Shutdown the remote server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

      • reset

        public void reset()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Reset the remote server. Disconnects from any connected client. Removes all installed handlers.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.
